title: ISic000120. I.Sicily inscription 000120
body:

2ACILIAivy-leafMFCRIS

4Mivy-leafVIIivy-leafDXV

Apparatus criticus

Text of Gualtherus

Latin translation

To the Shades of the underworld. Acilia Crispina, daughter of Marcus, lived two years, seven months and fifteen days.

commentary
